feature.label: UIMA-AS Deployment Descriptor Editor
feature.description: This feature adds to the UIMA Component Descriptor Editor (CDE) the ability to edit the Deployment Descriptor used by UIMA-AS to deploy UIMA components using Asynchronous Scaleout
